tool_description: A Word Dictionary API (Application Programming Interface) is a service that allows developers to integrate dictionary functionalities into their applications or websites. This API provides a standardized way for software applications to access and retrieve information related to words, including their meanings, pronunciations, synonyms, antonyms, and other linguistic details.  Developers can leverage a Word Dictionary API to enhance the language-related features of their applications. This ca...
name: Word Dictionary API
title: Word Dictionary API
